data.text:
-That's why. I'm sorry. The running 
style you taught me, for me is…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>-That's why. I'm sorry. The running 
<story>style you taught me, for me is…

data.text:
I see… I'm sorry, I must have caused you a lot of distress. And 
you, Trainer-san, thank you for being concerned about her.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer

choices.text: Please expand her potenial as much as possible
choices.processed: <size=34>Please expand her potenial as much as possible</size>

data.processed:
<story>I see… I'm sorry, I must have caused you a lot of distress. And 
<story>you, Trainer-san, thank you for being concerned about her.

data.text:
I'd like to but… My instruction style is a 
bit rigid, so I might end up putting you through 
this uncomfortable situation again.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I'd like to but… My instruction style is a 
<story>bit rigid, so I might end up putting you through 
<story>this uncomfortable situation again.

data.text:
So… how about this, Suzuka? How about transferring and being 
under the supervision of this trainer?
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>So… how about this, Suzuka? How about transferring and being 
<story>under the supervision of this trainer?

data.text: Eh? Transfer…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Eh? Transfer…?

data.text:
Yes. Having flexible thinking, and above all, 
having deep consideration for Uma Musume… for 
you. I think she's a wonderful person.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Yes. Having flexible thinking, and above all, 
<story>having deep consideration for Uma Musume… for 
<story>you. I think she's a wonderful person.

data.text: Um… I-is that okay with you? With someone like me…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: If that's what you want, absolutely…!
If that's what you want, absolutely…!

data.processed: <story>Um… I-is that okay with you? With someone like me…

data.text: …Ah!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Ah!

data.text: Thank you… very much. Please treat me well, Trainer-san…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Thank you… very much. Please treat me well, Trainer-san…!

data.text:
How wonderful, Suzuka! From the bottom of my heart, 
I'm looking forward to your performance.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>How wonderful, Suzuka! From the bottom of my heart, 
<story>I'm looking forward to your performance.

data.text:
Oh, but it's a different story if it's against a girl I'm 
supervising. At that time, we'll come at you with our full 
strength, so make sure you're prepared.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Oh, but it's a different story if it's against a girl I'm 
<story>supervising. At that time, we'll come at you with our full 
<story>strength, so make sure you're prepared.

data.text: Yes!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yes!

data.text:
Um… I know it's a bit sudden, Trainer-san. But, my debut was 
planned for next month. What should we do…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Um… I know it's a bit sudden, Trainer-san. But, my debut was 
<story>planned for next month. What should we do…?

data.text:
Silence Suzuka's wavering gaze was full of motiviation. Suddenly 
stopping her here probably wouldn't be a good idea.

choices.text: Let's enter the debut race, as planned!
choices.processed: <size=42>Let's enter the debut race, as planned!</size>

data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka's wavering gaze was full of motiviation. Suddenly 
<story>stopping her here probably wouldn't be a good idea.

data.text: It's okay for me to run…?! Thank you very much!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>It's okay for me to run…?! Thank you very much!

data.text: Then… what should I do in regards to my running strategy…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Then… what should I do in regards to my running strategy…?

data.text:
I understand what I've learned. 'Escape' is high risk. As I am 
now, someday I might not be able to continue running in the lead.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I understand what I've learned. 'Escape' is high risk. As I am 
<story>now, someday I might not be able to continue running in the lead.

data.text: Silence Suzuka's words are correct. But-
data.processed: <story>Silence Suzuka's words are correct. But-

data.text: …I want to run out in front.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…I want to run out in front.

data.text:
Once more, I want to reach that place again and again. These 
feelings alone…I won't concede…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Once more, I want to reach that place again and again. These 
<story>feelings alone…I won't concede…!

data.text:
Her stubborness about leading… that point aside, Silence Suzuka 
already posesses strength second to none.
data.processed:
<story>Her stubborness about leading… that point aside, Silence Suzuka 
<story>already posesses strength second to none.

data.text:
Beyond that feeling, there might be a new potential 
that no other Uma Musume has reached before…!
data.processed:
<story>Beyond that feeling, there might be a new potential 
<story>that no other Uma Musume has reached before…!

data.text:
"Lead from start to finish without slowing"- It will be 
difficult, but by no means is it impossible.
data.processed:
<story>"Lead from start to finish without slowing"- It will be 
<story>difficult, but by no means is it impossible.

data.text: …you believe in my running, it seems.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…you believe in my running, it seems.

data.text: Understood. I will meet your expectations, without fail.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Understood. I will meet your expectations, without fail.

data.text:
And with that, we turned towards preparation for 
her debut race with some special training…!
data.processed:
<story>And with that, we turned towards preparation for 
<story>her debut race with some special training…!

data.text:
Run in the lead from the start until the end without slowing 
down… how should I actualize this?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Run in the lead from the start until the end without slowing 
<story>down… how should I actualize this?

data.text:
"The energy required to accelerate is limited, 
so running to preserve stamina is necessary" 
was what I was told before though…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: I guess we need to maximize that energy
choices.processed: <size=40>I guess we need to maximize that energy</size>

choices.text: I guess we need to maximize that energy
choices.processed: <size=40>I guess we need to maximize that energy</size>

data.processed:
<story>"The energy required to accelerate is limited, 
<story>so running to preserve stamina is necessary" 
<story>was what I was told before though…

data.text:
For the sake of training her instantaneous power and stamina in a 
balanced manner, I suggested Hill Sprints
data.processed:
<story>For the sake of training her instantaneous power and stamina in a 
<story>balanced manner, I suggested Hill Sprints

data.text:
Hill Sprints is it? Understood. But… doesn't 
the school course seem a little lacking?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Hill Sprints is it? Understood. But… doesn't 
<story>the school course seem a little lacking?

data.text:
How about… climbing a mountain? Since 
we have the opportunity…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>How about… climbing a mountain? Since 
<story>we have the opportunity…!

data.text:
And thus I spent the days training 
with a fired up Silence Suzuka-
data.processed:
<story>And thus I spent the days training 
<story>with a fired up Silence Suzuka-

data.text: And then, finally…!
data.processed: <story>And then, finally…!

data.text: Oh, Air Groove! You came?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Oh, Air Groove! You came?

data.text: Yeah, to be honest, I was a little worried.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Yeah, to be honest, I was a little worried.

data.text: Hu… but, seeing your expression, it seems it was unnecessary.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Hu… but, seeing your expression, it seems it was unnecessary.

data.text: Fufuu…I'll be starting soon, so I'm heading out.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu…I'll be starting soon, so I'm heading out.

data.text: Yeah. I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Yeah. I'm looking forward to it.

data.text:
Now, gathering under this blue sky are the Uma Musume 
eager to compete in the Twinkle Series!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Now, gathering under this blue sky are the Uma Musume 
<story>eager to compete in the Twinkle Series!

data.text:
The participating Uma Musume are in 
their gates… Debut Race, Start!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The participating Uma Musume are in 
<story>their gates… Debut Race, Start!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa…!

data.text:
Right at the start with unbelieveable speed, 
jumping ahead and leaving everyone behind is 
the girl #1 in popularity, Silence Suzuka!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Right at the start with unbelieveable speed, 
<story>jumping ahead and leaving everyone behind is 
<story>the girl #1 in popularity, Silence Suzuka!

data.text:
That girl, Suzuka, is amazing isn't she?! Do escape-type Uma 
Musume normally go that fast at the start?!
data.name: Spectator A
data.processed:
<story>That girl, Suzuka, is amazing isn't she?! Do escape-type Uma 
<story>Musume normally go that fast at the start?!

data.text:
But, this isn't just a debut race, it's the Twinkle Series! Using 
that much power at the start, she shouldn't be able to make it…
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed:
<story>But, this isn't just a debut race, it's the Twinkle Series! Using 
<story>that much power at the start, she shouldn't be able to make it…

data.text: (Still… still, it's too noisy. Not yet. More…!)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>(Still… still, it's too noisy. Not yet. More…!)

data.text: Fuu…!!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fuu…!!

data.text:
We're entering the final stages of the race, but Silence 
Suzuka doesn't falter! She surges ahead, extending 
her lead, further and further forward!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>We're entering the final stages of the race, but Silence 
<story>Suzuka doesn't falter! She surges ahead, extending 
<story>her lead, further and further forward!

data.text: No way…! At this rate, is she seriously going to do it…?!
data.name: Spectator B
data.processed: <story>No way…! At this rate, is she seriously going to do it…?!

data.text: (I won't let anyone stand in my way. I won't yield, to anyone.)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>(I won't let anyone stand in my way. I won't yield, to anyone.)

data.text: The scenery from the lead… belongs to me!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>The scenery from the lead… belongs to me!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka, with a 7 length lead, goooooaaal in! With a 
logic-defying escape run, the crowd goes wild!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka, with a 7 length lead, goooooaaal in! With a 
<story>logic-defying escape run, the crowd goes wild!

data.text: WHOOOOAAA!!
data.processed: <story>WHOOOOAAA!!

data.text:
Suzuka, someone like you…! You've 
become quite a fearsome opponent!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka, someone like you…! You've 
<story>become quite a fearsome opponent!

data.text: Haa…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa…

data.text: Satisfied?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Satisfied?

data.text: Let's go see even better scenery, together…Trainer-san!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Let's go see even better scenery, together…Trainer-san!
